context: i have a date tonight can you recommend some great romantic comedies
sure is there a particular era you would like to be recommended new or old
Older ones i think i liked Casablanca (1942) Come on man the date is closing up!
What do you like most about Casablanca, Casablanca (1985). I have not seen it. How about the remake?
I have not seen the remake, i dont want to ruin my good experience :D Its like the remake of The Godfather (1972), imagine that...probably not a good movie :D
resp: I totally understand. I recommend Singing Lovebirds (1939)
